long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add items to your OurWishes registry from any store on the web!

Shopping online and spot a cool gift? The Wish It! extension magically grabs the link to add that item to your OurWishes registry!
